metadata.title: CVE-2024-26681 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netdevsim: avoid potential loop in nsim_dev_trap_report_work() Many syzbotreports include the following trace [1] If nsim_dev_trap_report_work() cannot grab the mutex, it should rearm itself at least one jiffie later.
